title: Rob "Bender" Park of TRUCK NIGHT AMERICA
description:
Rob 'Bender' Park is one of the stars of History's 'Truck Night in America!" Earning his nickname from bending trucks on rocks, Bender is a dirt racer, be it bikes, quads, ovals, or King of the Hammers, while building many of his own race vehicles.

 

Watch TNA: https://www.history.com/shows/truck-night-in-america

This show is a video! https://youtu.be/sZTigT4lOvg

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
